name: eshop-on-container
description: Eshop built on container based on .NET project

scripts.presetup: (cd libs/error-handler && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules) && (cd libs/logger && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules) && (cd libs/validator && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules)
scripts.setup: (cd libs/error-handler && yarn install) && (cd libs/logger && yarn install) && (cd libs/validator && yarn install)

author: T&B
